typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		first_name as string,
		middle_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		SSN as string,
		apt_no as string,
		street_name as string,
		cust_city as string,
		cust_state as string,
		cust_country as string,
		cust_zip as string,
		cust_phone as string,
		cust_email as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(cust_address = concatWS(',',apt_no,street_name)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
